channel.title: How do i make players start with 99 prayer, also fixing tele glitch
channel.description: need help with both, I also have 2 other more complicated errors, so if ur a good coder please post that u can help with the other 2 =)

item.title: How do i make players start with 99 prayer, also fixing tele glitch
item.dc:creator: @gunztheduel gunztheduel
item.description:
@gunztheduel wrote:

[quote=“Slivion, post:10, topic:102648”][center][quote author=gunztheduel link=topic=147068.msg1399240#msg1399240 date=1180531032]
That just makes it above ground floor…
[/quote]

Nope.
Look at your character stats.
His normal height is 1.
The height for teleport is set to 0.[/center][/quote]

The normal height is 0… Try changing Varrock Teleport to 1 height. You will be above the ground, up to the next level.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make players start with 99 prayer, also fixing tele glitch

It may work.[/center]

item.title: How do i make players start with 99 prayer, also fixing tele glitch
item.dc:creator: @gunztheduel gunztheduel
item.description:
@gunztheduel wrote:

Open player.java and find -

for (int i=0; i<playerLevel.length; i++) { //Setting Levels if (i == 3) { playerLevel[i] = 99; playerXP[i] = 14000000; } else { playerLevel[i] = 1; playerXP[i] = 0; } }

You get the point, don’t you -_-

Read full topic
